tooltips.amount: The initial quantity of the item that was received. Mandatory field.
tooltips.receivedAt: Date de réception des articles. Champ obligatoire.
tooltips.currentQuantity: The current quantity of the item.
tooltips.currentQuantityUpdatedAt: The last time the item quantity was updated.
tooltips.item: The item registered in the stock. Select from the items database. Mandatory field.
tooltips.warehouse: The warehouse where the stock is stored. Mandatory field.
tooltips.branch: The branch using the stock. Mandatory field.
tooltips.program: The program that funded the stock. Mandatory field.
tooltips.createdAt: The date and time this stock entry was created.
tooltips.modifiedAt: The date and time this stock entry was last modified.
